name: Cursed Maze
description:
An adventure game we built for the first Fadergs Game Jam. You're in the shoes of a princess who got cast into the castle maze. However, the maze has been cursed, and demons are on the prowl. Luckily, you can ward them off using magic spells as you travel between dimensions to escape the labyrinth!

Update 1.1:
- Added WASD keys for movement
- Fixed texture disappearing when changing dimensions
- Added vignette effect for maximum coolness
- Fixed fireball always appearing behind player sprite
- Dynamic music now works correctly

Controls:
WASD/Arrows: movement
Spacebar: shoots magic
Esc: ends the game

We are:

Juliano Reis - Code, Level Design

Vitória Steckel - Art, Game Design

Pietro Gama - Art

Gustavo Nunes - Music

Eloisa Paz - Additional Art
